mapper.select: SELECT CNTR_NO , CNTR_SN , CUST_NM , PART_PD_CD , PART_NM -- (selectPartMaster 에서 SVPD_NM_KOR) , LAST_USE_DT -- 해당 필터 마지막 교체 일자 , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(LAST_USE_DT, WRK_CYCL),'YYYYMMDD') AS NEXT_VST_DT -- 교체예정일자 , CASE WHEN MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')||'01', SUBSTR(LAST_USE_DT,1,6)||'01') >= WRK_CYCL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CHAGE_YN -- 교체대상여부 , (SELECT CSMR_UPRC_AMT FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ WHERE 1=1 AND FNL_VST_FSH_DT = V1.LAST_USE_DT AND ITM_PD_CD = V1.PART_PD_CD AND CNTR_NO = V1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = V1.CNTR_SN ) AS CSMR_UPRC_AMT FROM ( SELECT T1.CNTR_NO AS CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN AS CNTR_SN , T3.RCGVP_KNM AS CUST_NM , T1.IST_DT AS IST_DT , T4.SELL_TP_CD AS SELL_TP_CD , T1.PDCT_PD_CD AS PDCT_PD_CD , T5.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N AS FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N , MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM')||'01', SUBSTR(T1.IST_DT,1,6)||'01') AS INST_MTH , T6.PART_PD_CD AS PART_PD_CD -- 해당 상품/방문주기/필터 교체 주기 , ( SELECT MIN(VST_NMN_N) /* 2024.01.23 홍세기 각 필터에 대한 주기를 구하여 다음 교체 대상인지 파악하기 위함 */ FROM TB_PDBS_RGBS_WK_BASE_DTL WHERE SV_PD_CD = T1.SV_PD_CD AND PDCT_PD_CD = T1.PDCT_PD_CD AND PART_PD_CD = T6.PART_PD_CD AND VST_DV_CD != '20' ) AS WRK_CYCL -- 해당 필터 마직막 교체 일자 , NVL(( SELECT MAX(FNL_VST_FSH_DT) FROM TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ WHERE CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND ITM_PD_CD = T6.PART_PD_CD) , T1.IST_DT ) AS LAST_USE_DT , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(VST_DUEDT), T1.IST_DT) FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_RGBSPR_IZ WHERE VST_NMN_N != '0' AND CNTR_NO = T1.CNTR_NO AND CNTR_SN = T1.CNTR_SN AND WK_DT IS NOT NULL ) AS LAST_VST_DT -- 주기표상 마지막 방문일자 , T7.SVPD_NM_KOR AS PART_NM FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL T2 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T2.DTL_CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T2.DTL_CNTR_SN AND T2.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN T2.VL_STRT_DTM AND T2.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS T3 ON T2.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = T3.CNTR_ADRPC_ID INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL T4 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T4.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T4.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_WELLS_DTL T5 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T5.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T5.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN TB_PDBS_RGBS_WK_BASE_DTL T6 ON T1.PDCT_PD_CD = T6.PDCT_PD_CD AND T1.SV_PD_CD = T6.SV_PD_CD AND T6.PART_PD_CD IS NOT NULL AND T6.VST_NMN_N = ( SELECT MIN (VST_NMN_N) /* 2024.01.23 홍세기 박누리M 협의 택배도 대상필터로 포함 */ FROM TB_PDBS_RGBS_WK_BASE_DTL WHERE SV_PD_CD = T6.SV_PD_CD AND PDCT_PD_CD = T6.PDCT_PD_CD AND PART_PD_CD = T6.PART_PD_CD AND PART_PD_CD IS NOT NULL ) INNER JOIN () T7 ON T7.SVPD_PD_CD = T6.PART_PD_CD WHERE T1.IST_DT IS NOT NULL AND T1.CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} AND T1.CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /* 2024.01.23 홍세기 박누리M 협의 무상기간 관련없이 필터 조회 */ -- AND MONTHS_BETWEEN(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') || '01', SUBSTR(T1.IST_DT, 1, 6) || '01') >= T5.FRISU_BFSVC_PTRM_N ORDER BY T6.PART_PD_CD ) V1
